entities.name: liarmus
entities.description: The Disarming Charm is mentioned in the text. It is described as a basic spell that Harry has found useful.

entities.name: zacharias smith
entities.description: Zacharias Smith is introduced as a character who doubts the effectiveness of Expelliarmus against You-Know-Who.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who has used Expelliarmus successfully against You-Know-Who and saved his life.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is introduced as a character that Harry has faced before and defeated with the help of Expelliarmus.

entities.name: expelliarmus
entities.description: Expelliarmus is mentioned in the text as a spell that Harry has used successfully against You-Know-Who.

relationships.description: Harry has used Expelliarmus to save his life from You-Know-Who.
Zacharias Smith is opposed to Harry and believes that Expelliarmus will not be effective against You-Know-Who.
